header_breakpoint_value.label: Set Value of Breakpoint which take before header.

header_opacity.label: Header Background Opacity
header_opacity.comment: This only work if you set 'Header Background' from theme design

bannerpossition.label: Banner Position
bannerpossition.comment: Banner with content work when you only set your page with 2 columns

banner_breakpoint_value.label: Set Value of Breakpoint which take before banner.

bannerwidth.label: Display Banner in Template Width
bannerwidth.comment: This does not work if u set banner position with content.

slide_speed.label: Slide Speed
slide_speed.comment: Add integrer in milliseconds, for example 5000 for 5 seconds.

auto_play.label: Auto Play
auto_play.comment: Add integrer in milliseconds, for example 5000 to play every 5 seconds. Blank will make it false.

rewind_nav.label: Rewind Nav
rewind_nav.comment: Takes slide to first item after reaching last. Use Rewind Speed to change animation speed.

rewind_speed.label: Rewind Speed
rewind_speed.comment: Add integrer in milliseconds, for example 5000 for 5 seconds.

scroll_per_page.label: Scroll Per Page
scroll_per_page.comment: Yes : Scroll per page not per item.

lazyload.label: LazyLoad
lazyload.comment: Delays loading of images. Images outside of viewport wont be loaded before user scrolls to them.

alter_image.label: Select Method To Set Alter Image

alter_image_value.label: Set Value Used to Set Alter Image

display_productname_singleline.label: Display Product Name In Single Line

column_count.label: Products per row
column_count.comment: Note : This will work if page width is less than or equal to 1024. Due to fluid width : Number of product increases to set accordingly if page width is greater than 1024.

equalheight.label: Enable Equal height
equalheight.comment: It will take same height to all grid products.

product_view.label: Product View Page
product_view.comment: Note: Width should be calculated in %. Sum of all column has to be equal 94%.

brandlogo.label: Display Brand Logo on Product Page

image_aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
image_aspect_ratio.comment: Set to 'Yes' will take image height automatically based on image width itherwise it display with default size.

brandblock.label: Disable Brand Block on Right Sidebar

bestsellerblock.label: Disable Bestseller Block on Right Sidebar

customcss.label: Enable Custom CSS
customcss.comment:
Yes : to load custom.css file.
Copy the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" and rename it to "custom.css". Otherwise this file will not be loded by Magento.

dropdown_linkhover_bgcolor.label: Dropdown Menu Link Hover BG Color

topmenu_fontshover_bg_color.label: Top Menu Fonts Hover Background Color

submenu_fonts.label: SubMenu Fonts
submenu_fonts.comment: Note : "This will be effective only with custom menu"

submenu_fonts_color.label: SubMenu Fonts Color
submenu_fonts_color.comment: Note : "This will be effective only with custom menu"

submenu_fontshover_color.label: SubMenu FontsHover Color
submenu_fontshover_color.comment: Note : "This will be effective only with custom menu"

custom_width.label: Maximum Page Width
custom_width.comment: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.
